Never Let Go is an upcoming American horror-thriller film directed by Alexandre Aja from a screenplay by Kevin Coughlin and Ryan Grassby. It stars Halle Berry.


Premise[edit]
A family consisting of a mother and her twin sons has suffered from the torment of a malicious spirit for many years. However, when one of the boys starts to doubt the existence of the evil, the family's sacred bond is broken, leading to a dangerous fight for survival.[1]

Cast[edit]
Halle Berry
Percy Daggs IV
Anthony B. Jenkins
Production[edit]
Development[edit]
In August 2020, Kevin Coughlin and Ryan Grassby's horror script Mother Land was acquired by Shawn Levy's company 21 Laps Entertainment with Lionsgate Films set to distribute.[2] In April 2021, Mark Romanek was hired to direct the film.[3] The following month, it was announced that Romanek left the project and Alexandre Aja was set to direct with Halle Berry joining the cast.[1] In June 2022, Lionsgate sold the international rights to multiple companies during the Cannes Film Festival.[4] In April 2023, Percy Daggs IV and Anthony B. Jenkins joined the cast of the now titled film, Never Let Go.[5]

Filming[edit]
Principal photography took place in Vancouver, British Columbia from April 17 to June 2, 2023.[6][7]

Release[edit]
Never Let Go is scheduled to be released in the United States on September 27, 2024, replacing Saw XI.[8]
